imdb.plot outline: Istorya is 30-minute documentary that exposes the stark realities of the socio-political and economic conditions the country is facing today. Istorya's stories on human interest are told through the contemporary lives of individuals; highlighting not only the extraordinary but also the provocative.
imdb.title: Istorya
plot: _Istorya_ (qv) is 30-minute documentary that exposes the stark realities of the socio-political and economic conditions the country is facing today. _Istorya_ (qv)'s stories on human interest are told through the contemporary lives of individuals; highlighting not only the extraordinary but also the provocative.::anonymous
